law.catch_line: Decree Upon Petition For Leave To Sell Property; Scope
law.text: The decree of a probate court upon a petition for leave to sell real or personal property shall be sufficient to authorize any action requiring a license by said court by any general or special law. A decree, authority, or order of said court shall contain a description of the real or personal property and the terms of sale.
